name: Giant Bible Word Search Pro
description:
Pro version of highly popular Giant Bible Word Search Puzzle app. All the word packs are unlocked in this app.

Treat for our dear friends - Giant Bible Word Search Puzzle Pro app.
Have fun for hours

There are many section you can choose to play. Your goal is to find all the hidden BIBLE words inside the grid. Hidden words can be in any orientation- up, down, left, right, or diagonally. You can also get word puzzles in either direction, forward or backward, much to spin your head.

How to Play?
- Swipe over the letters in the board to form the words shown below it.
- Find all the words in the list to complete the level.
- Stuck somewhere – use hint or remove extra character feature to solve the puzzle.
- Find the words faster and share your best time on your social network & earn 100 game coins each time you share.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
For any assistance please contact us on support@bgnode.com

Try Giant Bible Word Search Puzzle Pro app now !!!
